ID: 10364406 2. Because at Friendly’s they treat you like ice cream lover royalty. View this image ›
art.geek10.4 / Via instagram.com Say “hello” to the Royal Banana Split.
ID: 10364416 3. And they can please ANY crowd, big… View this image ›
nikki_colle / Via instagram.com Six toppings on any six flavors of ice cream? No problem!
ID: 10364464 4. …or small. View this image ›
friendlys / Via instagram.com So simple, yet so good.

cassielulumay / Via instagram.com Monster Mash Sundae? Yum.
ID: 10364444 6. …any time of year. View this image ›
keo_kaney_ / Via instagram.com Santa Sundae!!!!
ID: 10364447 7. In fact, sometimes Friendly’s is so damn good it’s too hard to pick just ONE delight. View this image ›
jabor93 / Via instagram.com Decisions, decisions…
ID: 10364495 8. So, it’s a good thing you can ALWAYS get some to go… View this image ›
friendlys / Via instagram.com Got my meals planned for the week.
ID: 10364548 9. …for, you know, your stockpile at home. View this image ›
dbinelli / Via instagram.com Muhahaha.
ID: 10364568 10. But the beauty doesn’t just stop with straight-up scoops of ice cream. View this image ›
days104 / Via instagram.com The thickest, most glorious shake you’ll ever meet.
ID: 10364574 11. ‘Cause some of the classic faves actually come in ~cake~ form. View this image ›
junkbanter / Via instagram.com Crying just looking at this photo, TBH.
ID: 10364625 12. Or even super nostalgic roll form. View this image ›
hernameisrio / Via instagram.com FYI: Those are chocolate chip “seeds” thus making this 101% better than a real watermelon.
ID: 10364563 13. And let’s not even get started on how good the actual FOOD menu is. View this image ›
mighty_mika101 / Via instagram.com Because that’s a whole other discussion in itself.
ID: 10364680 14. Friendly’s instantly puts a smile on everyone’s face. View this image ›
lizzy_r_p / Via instagram.com :-D
ID: 10364689 15. Even non-humans get excited about it. View this image ›
friendlys / Via instagram.com “Why, yes, I’ll hold your food for you, but I can’t guarantee I won’t eat it.”
ID: 10364700 16. Heck, Friendly’s itself gets excited about giving you ice cream for free when there’s a cause for celebration. View this image ›
jenniferellegard / Via instagram.com Everyone friggin’ wins!
